short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download videos from Amazon. Its batch download feature lets you grab multiple videos simultaneously.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an Amazon video downloader extension. It allows you to download videos from Amazon with ease. Here's how it works:

Click the extension icon when you're on an Amazon video page.
A list of available videos will be displayed.
Click the download button next to the video you want.
You'll be redirected to https://amz-downloader.alttextgenerator.net/
Wait a moment for the video to process.
Once complete, click the download button to save the video to your device.

With this simple process, you can quickly and easily download your favorite Amazon videos for offline viewing.
